SQL.LOAD: SELECT ap_invoice_header_id, line_number, line_type, vendor_item_code, description, quantity, uom_xcd, matched_quantity, paid_quantity, unit_price, total_price, parent_line_number, po_number, po_date, billing_period_start_date, billing_period_end_date, reference_number, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, vendor_transaction_type, ap_invoice_lines_id FROM elp_ap_invoice_lines WHERE ap_invoice_lines_id = :ap_invoice_lines_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_ap_invoice_lines SET ap_invoice_header_id = :ap_invoice_header_id, line_number = :line_number, line_type = :line_type, vendor_item_code = :vendor_item_code, description = :description, quantity = :quantity, uom_xcd = :uom_xcd, matched_quantity = :matched_quantity, paid_quantity = :paid_quantity, unit_price = :unit_price, total_price = :total_price, parent_line_number = :parent_line_number, po_number = :po_number, po_date = :po_date, billing_period_start_date = :billing_period_start_date, billing_period_end_date = :billing_period_end_date, reference_number = :reference_number, vendor_transaction_type = :vendor_transaction_type, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE ap_invoice_lines_id = :ap_invoice_lines_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_ap_invoice_lines ( ap_invoice_header_id, line_number, line_type, vendor_item_code, description, quantity, uom_xcd, matched_quantity, paid_quantity, unit_price, total_price, parent_line_number, po_number, po_date, billing_period_start_date, billing_period_end_date, reference_number, vendor_transaction_type, created_by, ap_invoice_lines_id ) VALUES ( :ap_invoice_header_id, :line_number, :line_type, :vendor_item_code, :description, :quantity, :uom_xcd, :matched_quantity, :paid_quantity, :unit_price, :total_price, :parent_line_number, :po_number, :po_date, :billing_period_start_date, :billing_period_end_date, :reference_number, :vendor_transaction_type, :created_by, :ap_invoice_lines_id )
